description:
Located in Hazleton, Pennsylvania, Kitay Law Offices has become one of Pennsylvania's most prominent full-service legal practices with six total offices in the state. This expansion lends credence to the level of success we have achieved fighting for the rights and interests of our clients who are dealing with complex, pressing legal issues involving any of the following areas:

  • Personal injury and wrongful death claims arising from car and other motor vehicle accidents as well as slip-and-falls, defective products and other preventable tragedies
  • Workers' compensation
  • Criminal defense
  • DUI defense
  • Immigration law

For the past 25 years of our existence, our law firm has become a trusted source for thousands of individuals, families, business owners and others seeking the highest level of personalized counsel and dedicated support for their legal matters. Our lawyers possess decades of combined legal experience, and they have appeared on various local and national news programs as well as in a variety of online outlets, where they have offered in-depth legal commentary on a wide range of legal topics.

Having been selected for inclusion in Pennsylvania Super Lawyers' Rising Stars, an annual distinction given to the top 2.5% of attorneys in the state who are either age 40 or younger or have been in practice for 10 years or less, our attorneys have earned consistent endorsements and accolades from their peers. Our firm has also received countless testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients. This means that you can rely on us to fight hard to increase your chances of obtaining the positive results you expect and deserve as efficiently and cost-effectively as possible.

For more information on how we can best assist you and your family during this difficult and uncertain time in your life, you can contact Kitay Law Offices by calling our office or visiting our website to schedule a free initial consultation. We also offer bilingual services in English and Spanish as well as virtual consultations by phone or videoconference.
